iwb.repository.impl

Class MetropolisDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • iwb.repository.impl.MetropolisDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetropolisDAO

    @Named(value="metropolisDAO")
public class MetropolisDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetropolisDAO
    Metropolis DAO implements methods to create, retreive, update and delete metropolises which are collections of cities with same recycling policies
